body.name: Start-X Remote Starter Kit for RAM Pickup Truck 2018-2023 Key Start (Tip-Start) || Key Start Trucks ONLY || Plug N Play || 3X Lock to Remote Start || 2018 2019 2020 2021 2022 2023 || 1500 2500 3500
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 6 hrs 36 mins
features: ✅ START YOUR TRUCK REMOTELY - Use the most complete Plug N Play Remote Starter KIT to warm up your truck in those freezing mornings, by pressing lock 3 times on your existing remote. No more waiting 10 min to defog your windshield. 😊

✅ COMPATIBILITY – This kit is compatible with all 2018-2023 RAM Pickup trucks that use a key to start. (Tip Start) Not Push to Start. The Ram Classic is compatible. 2018 2019 2020 2021 2022 2023. 1500 2500 3500 .
✅ PLUG ‘N PLAY T-HARNESS – The included Start-X T-Harness eliminates wire splicing and tapping.
✅PROGRAMMING – Computer is required to complete the installation. Windows or Mac.

✅ RANGE – The distance you can remote start from is the same distance you can lock/unlock your truck. You may want to test your remote to see if it’s enough for your remote start needs. Plug N Play long range remotes are available at an additional discounted cost.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Plug N Play Remote Start Kit YES! You can install a remote starter yourself. Please don’t pay exuberant dealer fees to have the dealer do what you can do yourself. The Start-X kit was designed with YOU in mind. You, the average car owner that can fix a thing or 2 yourself. The included T-harness greatly simplifies installation. Completely Plug N Play. ZERO WIRE TAPPING!

Using Your New System - 3X Lock The module will monitor the OEM remote for 3X Lock and will start your vehicle when you press lock 3 times. An aftermarket remote is not necessary, there are no extra key fobs to carry around.
Unique Start-X T-Harness The included T-harness is a unique Start-X T-Harness that can not be found anywhere else. The T-harness is neat and avoids the the usual "rats nest" of wires.
Complete Kit The kit contains everything you need for a successful installation, We even include a pry tool to pop the panels and zip ties to secure the module.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product works great so far. My truck didn’t come with a factory remote start and the dealership wanted an arm and a leg to install. This is a cheaper alternative but produces the same result. Installation was super easy. Programming the module was kinda confusing but I also missed a step so that was completely on me. I would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars never imagined it could be this easy and cheap to add remote start
reviews.reviewText: Works amazing, just as described and just as easy to install and works like a charm. Figure I might change my horn setting so it doesn't have to honk 3 times. but other than that I would buy again and am probably going to pick one up for my brother's truck as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy install and works perfectly
reviews.reviewText: Just bought and installed in my 2023 Ram 1500 classic with key start. easy to install and works perfectly. you have to install an app on the computer. directions that came with it spelled out every step. would highly recomend this remote starter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple installation and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I installed it in minutes and works very well with good range. It's been a blessing in the cold weather and no extra remote to carry!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a 2018 Ram 3500 with 6.7 Cum diesel. When is cold out diesel engines require a 5 or so second delay before you can start. You turn the key to the run position wait for the preheat of glow plugs then start. Once I followed the instructions exactly it had already recognized it needed to do this. Not a set back one. It worked 1st try. It comes with specific instructions instructions and pictures for your vehicle. Also I use my key fob.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put in
reviews.reviewText: My husband bought this for me for my Ram 2500. It didn’t take very long to put in. We watched the online video that they provided in the instructions and read the instructions. It works great. I have to park my truck outside because it is too long for my garage and I absolutely love using it in the colder weather here in Colorado. It works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well, but a bit of a hassle to program the software.
reviews.reviewText: I was really glad to purchase this as an option. In many instances, the OEM parts cost an arm and a leg, AND you have to program them at a dealer (looking at you, trailer brakes). I will preface this by saying I’m moderately skilled at mechanics and electronics, so I decided to take a crack at this.I had seen an install video where a guy spliced wires and I was fully prepared for that (which I hate doing). However I was pleasantly surprised when I opened the box and everything was simple plug and play, no cutting wires. Install of the physical harnesses are straightforward and the instructions are well laid out. I tracked down a windows computer with Internet Explorer and got to work. Programmed the module with my key as per the instructions and successfully flashed the module without issues. Worked great!A few days later, I accidentally unplugged one of the harnesses trying to install something else. Plugged it back in thinking it would go back to normal. It didn’t. I ended up having to email their tech support. They were prompt and thorough. I ended up resetting the module and starting over. Since then, I haven’t had any issues and the product has worked wonderfully.However, I gave it four stars because i believe the software needs to be updated. Windows just announced its phasing out Internet Explorer, and at the time of this writing, IE was the only browser that was capable of programming the module. It took me a while to track down a computer that actually had it, and it was a bit of a hassle. Overall though, I’m satisfied and I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. at first, I was skeptical of this product, but after watching tons and tons of YouTube videos, watching individuals install it and give feedback on it, and even looking at Reddit posts, I decided to purchase in hindsight, I ordered the item on the 15th and received it later that evening the install was simple has said, took approximately about 10 to 15 minutes and what an easy clean up I don’t claim to be a super automotive guy but all the videos and steps from the actual website provided enough detail and instruction to help you quickly install this it the install was simple has said, took approximately about 10 to 15 minutes and what an easy clean up I don’t claim to be a super automotive guy but all the videos and steps from the actual website provided enough detail and instruction to help you quickly install this item
easy to install. much less complicated than other stores products. Cheaper than other stores, even on sale
